text:
Message 3724 of 4024
Looking for an update please.
Nothing is normal. Zero about last night was normal. Sanity has left the building.
If you can help answer the questions I asked that would be appreciated since the two of you completely blocked me out of this discussion.
Let’s request the tapes today.
Sent:08/16/2024 at 08:05 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 08/16/2024 at 08:21 AM)
Subject:Re: Max
Message 3725 of 4024
He’s doing well and in good spirits. His heart rhythm bs k to normal.
They said this should hopefully be a one and done. Have follow up appointments to see more specialized to get answers to questions below.
Yes please request the tapes. That is not my priority today.
Sent:08/16/2024 at 08:25 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 08/16/2024 at 08:29 AM)
Subject:Re: Max
Message 3726 of 4024
Reference to “block from both of us “ is inflammatory.
Max had multiple confidential discussions with Seattle Children’s and has ability and right to ask and share certain things. I was not privy to those
conversations as they asked me to step out each time. If you have an issue with Max’s decisions please raise it with Jennifer directly.
If you had concerns with actions Seattle Children’s took please also raise those directly with them.
Sent:08/16/2024 at 08:33 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 08/16/2024 at 08:50 AM)
Subject:Re: Max
Message 3727 of 4024
Thanks you. I’m glad to hear that Max is physically okay after last night’s scare. I am concerned about the mental aspect, especially the screaming
"Robert stay away" into the phone. That isn’t normal, and we should consider accelerating therapy as he is getting worse.
Regarding his medication, as you know, Dr. Kwon involves me in discussions about Max’s Vyvanse—his dosage, diet, and overall health. Last time,
we agreed to reduce his dosage to 30mg and emphasized the importance of taking it daily, especially since he lost 10 pounds.
Sent:08/16/2024 at 08:50 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: Max
